docs.title: bgpipe: BGP reverse proxy and firewall
docs.text:
bgpipe is an open source tool for processing BGP messages, for example as a proxy between two BGP peers, that can inspect and modify BGP sessions on the fly. It is based on a Golang BGPFix library, available for many platforms, and distributed under the MIT license.

For an introduction, see the RIPE88 video below, or read an APNIC blog summary on it.
